mapper.select: SELECT book_bno, c_code, book_name, book_author, book_publishing_date, book_deposit, book_deposit_discount, book_publisher, book_content, book_up_folder, book_img, book_amount, book_loan, book_date, book_updatedate FROM book_table WHERE (book_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR book_author LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR book_publisher LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_table WHERE book_bno > 0

SELECT book_up_folder, book_img FROM ( SELECT book_up_folder, book_img, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY book_up_folder DESC) AS rn FROM book_table )
WHERE rn <= 5
